query:
SELECT 
  i.id,
  i.invoiceNumber,
  i.status,
  i.pickingOrderId,
  po.customerOrderNumber,
  po.shippingStatus
FROM invoices i
LEFT JOIN pickingOrders po ON po.id = i.pickingOrderId
WHERE i.invoiceNumber = '1002';
